mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER01 WHERE id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' AND name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'
select ename FROM emp WHERE empno = 7369
SELECT job FROM emp WHERE empno = 7369
SELECT deptno FROM emp WHERE empno = 7521
SELECT job FROM emp WHERE ename=#{ename}
SELECT * FROM emp WHERE ename LIKE '%'||#{ename}||'%' AND sal BETWEEN #{minSal} AND #{maxSal}
select * from emp where ename like '%'||#{ename_sch}||'%' and job like '%'||#{job_sch}||'%'
SELECT * FROM emp WHERE job IN (#{job01},#{job02})
SELECT * FROM emp WHERE hiredate BETWEEN to_date(#{startDte},'YYYY-MM-DD') AND to_date(#{endDte},'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT * FROM STUDENT02 WHERE name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' AND (kor+eng+math)/3 between #{stPt} AND #{edPt}
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, hire_date, job_id, salary, commission_pct, manager_id, department_id FROM EMPLOYEES WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID =#{id}
